title: Thank you riot for not letting me play Mordekaiser anymore!
body: Every time I say I want to go bot lane adc Morde, the team captain bans him. Thanks Riot for your groundbreaking meta changes!

replies.body: I thought it was kinda a known rule not to say where you are going because then people ban the champion... Happens a lot even not with morde.
